title: 494.04 GRANT PROGRAMS.
text:
The state or a municipality may contract with or make grants to a person carrying out a community dispute resolution program for the furnishing of program services provided by the person. The community dispute resolution program may be established under this chapter or otherwise. The grants may be in amounts as the state or municipality considers necessary or proper to assist in carrying out the purposes of this chapter.
For the purposes of this section, "municipality" means a statutory or home rule charter city or a county.
